segments.text: I see the girl standing there, her hand outstretched, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so innocent, but she’s part of this little conspiracy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is doing all the risky work, and she’s just standing by, ready to enjoy the reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever been the one to climb up there or if she always lets her brother do the dangerous part.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They make a good team, even if it’s a bit unfair.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware, and that makes their little adventure even more exciting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t get caught, but I also hope they don’t fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to give way, and I’m worried for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But at the same time, I can’t help but admire their determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re just kids being kids, and it’s kind of sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR
